name: api_core_Transform
description: Position, rotation and scale of an object.

properties.name: childCount
properties.description: The number of children the parent Transform has.

properties.name: eulerAngles
properties.description: The rotation as Euler angles in degrees.

properties.name: forward
properties.description: Returns a normalized vector representing the blue axis of the transform in world space.

properties.name: hasChanged
properties.description: Has the transform changed since the last time the flag was set to 'false'?

properties.name: hierarchyCapacity
properties.description: The transform capacity of the transform's hierarchy data structure.

properties.name: hierarchyCount
properties.description: The number of transforms in the transform's hierarchy data structure.

properties.name: localEulerAngles
properties.description: The rotation as Euler angles in degrees relative to the parent transform's rotation.

properties.name: localPosition
properties.description: Position of the transform relative to the parent transform.

properties.name: localRotation
properties.description: The rotation of the transform relative to the transform rotation of the parent.

properties.name: localScale
properties.description: The scale of the transform relative to the GameObjects parent.

properties.name: localToWorldMatrix
properties.description: Matrix that transforms a point from local space into world space (Read Only).

properties.name: lossyScale
properties.description: The global scale of the object (Read Only).

properties.name: position
properties.description: The world space position of the Transform.

properties.name: right
properties.description: The red axis of the transform in world space.

properties.name: root
properties.description: Returns the topmost transform in the hierarchy.

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: A Quaternion that stores the rotation of the Transform in world space.

properties.name: up
properties.description: The green axis of the transform in world space.

properties.name: worldToLocalMatrix
properties.description: Matrix that transforms a point from world space into local space (Read Only).
